item.description:
Thursday, 10/21 and Saturday 10/23

National Speaker, Wendy Patton

Despite the news...Do you realize today's Real Estate Market holds the very best opportunities?

Did you know that Real Estate has made more millionaires than anything else in the history of our great country?

Billionaire J. Paul Getty says "...Buy when everyone else is selling and sell when everyone else is buying..."

Billionaire Warren Buffet says "..Be fearful when others are greedy and greedy when others are fearful.."


6:30 PM, Thursday, October 21, 2010
Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA
Free for members; $25 for nonmembers

All Day Seminar - REGISTER NOW!
8:30 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday, October 23, 2010
Doubletree Boston, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston, MA
$49 for members of Boston AREIA; $79 for non-members; $129 day of event

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
